copy.top: Templates look like HTML because, essentially, they are. Embed templates support only a single element â€” the element will appear wherever you put {{{element_markup}}} in your template. Page templates can have as many elements as you like. Just paste in embed codes from the element you want. You'll find them on that element's page.
copy.injectelements: Press a button below to add the code for the corresponding element into the main code editor.
copy.noelements: Once you've added elements you'll be able to add them to your theme with the press of a button.
